Comments_List: I was given a  comprehensive summary of Korean history and society. I learned how to write, to read at a high level, and to speak.
I gained a better understanding of literary Korean and contemporary Korean issues.
One weakness is the lack of speaking discussions amongst students.
Professor Choi does well to tailor the class to the different levels of each student, and provides interesting material to work from.
Take this class if you wish to learn advanced Korean vocabulary and about its history and society. The class is challenging for non-heritage students, so keep in mind that this is a time commitment.

This is a good course for improving literary Korean ability. There is little emphasis on spoken Korean, but there are many useful phrases and terms that you will study in the context of timely issues.
